venue.address_1: (will give phone # after RSVP "Count Me In")
venue.name: Telephone Meetup

item.description:
When: Wednesday, Feb 23, 8 - 9 PM

Where: on the PHONE 

( you just pay for the long distance call )

** Phone # & handout will be sent to you after you RSVP : Count Me In".** 

 

[b]Meghan & Jamie Gilroy[/b], presenters at our FEB meetup, are back with us, this time on the phone. 

Bring your burning questions & challenges about finding your True Love or how to keep the "sparkle & zest" in your romance after the “honeymoon” is over.

**For folks who've come to the In-Person meetup on Feb 8th, Meghan & Jamie will share EXTRA tips. They ran out of time at our meetup.


"Chime in" from 8 - 9 PM on the phone ...

- with your questions

- to get support & suggestions

- to share your "True Love" LoA journey

 

Thank you very much, Meghan & Jamie, for your gift of wisdom & time this evening.

 

Check out the wonderful feedback & details of Feb 8th Meetup with Meghan & Jamie.

*******************************************************

About Meghan McChesney Gilroy & Jamie Gilroy:

Meghan & Jamie are Master Teachers, personally trained by don Miguel Ruiz, international bestselling author of The Four Agreements & The Mastery of Love.  As life coaches & spiritual teachers, they share their wisdom on conscious relationships, mindful parenting, and increasing abundance with individuals & couples through private appointments, teleclasses, seminars & journeys around the US and in Mexico.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: TELE-Meetup: "True Love" Masterminding with Meghan & Jamie Gilroy
